Description: Iron finger-ring; oval bezel with red jasper intaglio: horse standing to left, grazing; beneath the bezel is a small oval hole.
Bibliographic references: Finger Ring / Catalogue of the Finger Rings, Greek, Etruscan, and Roman, in the Departments of Antiquities, British Museum (1459)
Gem / Catalogue of Engraved Gems & Cameos, Greek, Etruscan & Roman in the British Museum (2407)
Acquisition name: Bequeathed by: Sir Augustus Wollaston Franks
